Goal

Work with people working for people. Create helpful products.

Background

By education I am Engineer-Manager. My studies were about how to build and sustain System of Quality Management in organisation, how to organise and improve processes inside of it.

I started to work as a programmer and web designer in 2005 while I was studying in University. Since 2009 I work on freelance base and participate on first stages of web development: conceptualising, brand and content strategy, wireframing, prototyping, graphic/web/UI design, front-end development.

Specialities

  • communication with stakeholders, coordination between them and developers;
  • information and content architecture;
  • design of user workflows and scenarios, wireframing;
  • responsive web design;
  • design in the browser;
  • user interface design (websites, data bases, web/iOS applications);
  • front-end development;
  • page templating and integrating interfaces into the applications/data bases (PHP/Wordpress, Rails, Node.js, Django, PL/SQL, Jekyll, Bootstrap);
  • coaching about HTML, CSS, preprocessors (SASS/LESS);
  • writing documentation and technical requirements.

Technologies

HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, Sass/LESS, Compass, JavaScript (jQuery), Grunt, Bootstrap, slim, SEO

Tools

Trello, Basecamp, Leankit, Paper & pencil, Post-it, Balsamiq Mockups, Adobe CS (Photoshop, Fireworks, InDesign), Git, Mercurial, SVN, Sublime Text 2, Keynote, Google Docs

You can have a look at my public repositories on github and bitbucket.
